chat.content:
============================
forall a b c d k : Z, 0 <= a -> 0 <= b -> 0 < c -> 0 <= d -> a = Z.mul k c -> b = Z.mul k d -> rel_prime a b -> k = 1

Related definitions and lemmas:
rel_prime = fun a b : Z => Zis_gcd a b 1 : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments rel_prime (_ _)%Z_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
rel_prime_cross_prod : forall a b c d : Z, rel_prime a b -> rel_prime c d -> b > 0 -> d > 0 -> a * d = b * c -> a = c /\ b = d
Zis_gcd_unique : forall a b c d : Z, Zis_gcd a b c -> Zis_gcd a b d -> c = d \/ c = - d
rel_prime_mult : forall a b c : Z, rel_prime a b -> rel_prime a c -> rel_prime a (b * c)
relp_mult3 : forall a b c : Z, rel_prime (a * b) c -> rel_prime a c
divide_mult_l : forall a b c : Z, c <> 0 -> (c * a | c * b) -> (a | b)
Zis_gcd_sym : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Zis_gcd b a d
Zis_gcd_bezout : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Bezout a b d
OMEGA3 : forall x y k : Z, k > 0 -> x = y * k -> x = 0 -> y = 0
Zis_gcd_minus : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a (- b) d -> Zis_gcd b a d
Gauss : forall a b c : Z, (a | b * c) -> rel_prime a b -> (a | c)
Zis_gcd_opp : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Zis_gcd b a (- d)
Zrel_prime_neq_mod_0 : forall a b : Z, 1 < b -> rel_prime a b -> a mod b <> 0
Bezout_intro : forall a b d u v : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> Bezout a b d
Bezout_ind : forall (a b d : Z) (P : Prop), (forall u v : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> P) -> Bezout a b d -> P
gcd_rel_prime : forall x y d : Z, Zis_gcd x y d -> exists a b : Z, x = d * a /\ y = d * b /\ rel_prime a b
OMEGA18 : forall x y k : Z, x = y * k -> Zne x 0 -> Zne y 0
not_divide1 : forall a b : Z, a <> 1 -> a <> -1 -> b <> 0 -> ~ (a * b | b)
Z_div_exact_1 : forall a b : Z, b > 0 -> a = b * (a / b) -> a mod b = 0
fast_OMEGA16 : forall (v c l k : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v * (c * k) + l * k) -> P ((v * c + l) * k)
Z.quot_unique_exact : forall a b q : Z, b <> 0 -> a = b * q -> q = a Ã· b
Z.div_unique_exact : forall a b q : Z, b <> 0 -> a = b * q -> q = a / b
rel_prime_bezout : forall a b : Z, rel_prime a b -> Bezout a b 1
bezout_rel_prime : forall a b : Z, Bezout a b 1 -> rel_prime a b
Zodd_def1 : forall z : Z, Zodd z -> exists k : Z, z = 2 * k + 1
Znumtheory.rel_prime_sym : forall a b : Z, rel_prime a b -> rel_prime b a
Z.div_mul : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> a * b / b = a
Z.quot_mul : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> a * b Ã· b = a
rel_prime_le_prime : forall a p : Z, prime p -> 1 <= a < p -> rel_prime a p
Zmult_neq_0 : forall a b : Z, a * b <> 0 -> a <> 0 /\ b <> 0
Zeven_def1 : forall z : Z, Zeven z -> exists k : Z, z = 2 * k

``` 
intros a b c d k H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7.
apply Zis_gcd_unique with (c:=1) in H6.
apply Zis_gcd_unique with (c:=1) in H7.
destruct H6; destruct H7.
- symmetry in H6; symmetry in H7.
  apply rel_prime_bezout in H6.
  apply rel_prime_bezout in H7.
  apply Bezout_intro in H6.
  apply Bezout_intro in H7.
  omega.
- destruct H7.
  apply rel_prime_mult with (c:=k) in H6.
  apply rel_prime_bezout in H6.
  omega.
- destruct H6.
  apply rel_prime_mult with (c:=k) in H7.
  apply rel_prime_bezout in H7.
  omega.
- clear H H0.
  apply rel_prime_bezout in H6.
  apply rel_prime_bezout in H7.
  destruct H6, H7.
  apply rel_prime_cross_prod with (c:=k) in H4.
  apply rel_prime_cross_prod with (c:=k) in H5.
  destruct H4 as [H4 _].
  destruct H5 as [H5 _].
  rewrite H4, H5.
  omega.
Qed.
```

original: intros a b c d k H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7. apply Zis_gcd_unique with (c:=1) in H6. apply Zis_gcd_unique with (c:=1) in H7. destruct H6; destruct H7. - symmetry in H6; symmetry in H7. apply rel_prime_bezout in H6. apply rel_prime_bezout in H7. apply Bezout_intro in H6. apply Bezout_intro in H7. omega. - destruct H7. apply rel_prime_mult with (c:=k) in H6. apply rel_prime_bezout in H6. omega. - destruct H6. apply rel_prime_mult with (c:=k) in H7. apply rel_prime_bezout in H7. omega. - clear H H0. apply rel_prime_bezout in H6. apply rel_prime_bezout in H7. destruct H6, H7. apply rel_prime_cross_prod with (c:=k) in H4. apply rel_prime_cross_prod with (c:=k) in H5. destruct H4 as [H4 _]. destruct H5 as [H5 _]. rewrite H4, H5. omega.
